textElements.text: Your cancellation has been approved and is ready for you to review and complete.

textElements.name: Approved Message
textElements.text: We have approved your cancellation based on the information provided.

textElements.name: Help Message Label
textElements.text: What doest this mean and why is it important?

textElements.name: Text
textElements.text:
You have the option to pay for your policy online today using credit card, or we can send you an invoice with other payment options (including cheque and EFT) that you can pay within 30 days.

You also have the option to pay for your policy monthly using premium finance.

textElements.name: Text
textElements.text: You have the option to receive your refund electronically into your bank account, or by a cheque in the mail. Plese select your preferred refund option below to complete your transaction.

textElements.name: Text
textElements.text: Based on your selections, you are not required to make a payment, nor are you entitled to a refund.

textElements.name: Text
textElements.text:
Thank you for renewing your Special Insurance Policy from ABC Insurance. Your new invoice and policy documentation has been sent to your email address.

Thanks for doing business with us, and if you have any questions, please don't hesitate to call us.

textElements.name: Text
textElements.text:
Thank you for adjusting your Special Insurance Policy from ABC Insurance. Your updated policy documentation has been sent to your email address.

Thanks for doing business with us, and if you have any questions, please don't hesitate to call us.

textElements.name: Text
textElements.text:
Thank you for adjusting your Special Insurance Policy from ABC Insurance. Your updated policy documentation has been sent to your email address.

The refund associated with your reduced premium will be processed using your selected method within 5 business days.

Thanks for doing business with us, and if you have any questions, please don't hesitate to call us.

textElements.name: Text
textElements.text:
Thank you for adjusting your Special Insurance Policy from ABC Insurance. Your updated policy documentation has been sent to your email address.

Note that because your selections resulted in the same premium as before, you are not required to provide any payment details.

Thanks for doing business with us, and if you have any questions, please don't hesitate to call us.

textElements.name: Text
textElements.text: You have completed the cancellation of your insurance policy. A confirmation of your cancellation has been sent to your email address, including an invoice for your balance payment. Thanks for doing business with us, and if you have any questions, please don't hesitate to call us.

textElements.name: Text
textElements.text: You have completed the cancellation of your insurance policy. A confirmation of your cancellation has been sent to your email address, including a credit note for your refund amount. The refund will be processed using your selected method within 5 business days. Thanks for doing business with us, and if you have any questions, please don't hesitate to call us.

textElements.name: Text
textElements.text: You have completed the cancellation of your insurance policy. A confirmation of your cancellation has been sent to your email address. Note that because your selections did not result in a refund, you are not required to provide any payment details. Thanks for doing business with us, and if you have any questions, please don't hesitate to call us.

textElements.name: Text
textElements.text: This quote has been completed and can no longer be modified. If there is anything else we can help you with please request a call-back, and one of our representatives will contact you within one business day.

textElements.name: Text
textElements.text: The quote you're trying to edit has expired. Would you like to copy the question answers from this quote, and use them to pre-populate a new quote?

textElements.name: Text
textElements.text: Would you like to resume the quote you previously created, or start a brand new quote?

textElements.name: Text
textElements.text: The quote you previously created has expired. Would you like to start a brand new quote, or would you like to pre-populate your new quote with the question answers from your previous quote?

textElements.name: Text
textElements.text: Please confirm your personal details below before proceeding to create your account.

textElements.name: Text
textElements.text: Your user account has been created. To make sure that your information is protected an email has been sent to you with a link to create a password and activate your account.

textElements.name: Text
textElements.text: If there is anything else we can help you with, please request a call-back and one of our representatives will contact you within one business day.

textElements.name: Text
textElements.text: Thank you for your interest in our insurance solutions. Please complete this enquiry form, and one of our representatives will get back to you as soon as we can.

textElements.name: Text
textElements.text: Your details have been passed on to one of our qualified insurance specialists, who will contact you shortly and provide assistance.

textElements.name: Text
textElements.text: An email has been sent to you with a copy of your quote, as well as a link that you can use to open and complete your quote in the future.

textElements.name: Text
textElements.text: If you would like to send a copy of the current quote to the customer, including a link to complete the quote, then please enter your own details below to proceed.

textElements.name: Text
textElements.text: An email has been sent to the customer with a copy of the quote, as well as a link that they can use to open and complete the quote if they choose to.

textElements.name: Text
textElements.text: Based on your selections on of our representatives will need to review your details before you can complete your purchase. You will be notified by email when the review of your quote has been completed. You still have the option to edit your quote, which will allow you to make changes while also stopping the review process. If you have questions or concerns in the mean time you may request a call-back, and one of our representatives will contact you within one business day.

textElements.name: Text
textElements.text:
Your quote is in the process of being reviewed by one of our representatives. When the review has been completed you will be notified by email.

You still have the option to edit your quote, which will allow you to make changes while also stopping the review process.

If you have questions or concerns in the mean time you may request a call-back, and one of our representatives will contact you within one business day.

textElements.name: Text
textElements.text:
Your quote has been approved and is ready for you to review, and proceed with if you choose.

You can also edit your quote details if you need to make changes, however please note that making changes to your quote could mean that the updated details will need to be reviewed again before your quote can be completed.

If you have questions or concerns in the mean time you may request a call-back, and one of our representatives will contact you within one business day.

textElements.name: Text
textElements.text: Your quote has been reviewed by one of our representatived, however we require some more information from you before we can proceed.

textElements.name: Text
textElements.text:
The review of your quote has been completed. Unfortunately, based on your selections we are unable to proceed with your quote at this point.

You may edit your quote, and depending on the changes you make to your answers you may get a different result.

If you have questions or concerns in the mean time you may Enquire, and one of our representatives will contact you within one business day.

textElements.name: Text
textElements.text: This quote has been submitted for review. After performing the review, you may either approve the quote, return the quote to the customer with comments, or decline the quote.

textElements.name: Text
textElements.text: This quote had been approved and released to the customer, who can now complete the purchase of their policy.

textElements.name: Text
textElements.text: This quote has been returned to the customer with your comments. Another review may be triggered before they can complete the purchase of their policy, depending on how they respond to your comments.

textElements.name: Text
textElements.text: This quote has been declined. The customer may choose to edit their quote, and this may result in another review depending on which questions are answered differently.

textElements.name: Text
textElements.text: You have reviewed and approved this quote. However, based on the answers the quote has been referred to an underwriter for endorsement. The customer will be notified of the outcome of the endorsement process once it has been completed.

textElements.name: Text
textElements.text:
Based on your selections an underwriter will need to assess and endorse your quote before you can complete your purchase. You will be notified by email when the assessment is complete.

You still have the option to edit your quote, which will allow you to make changes while also stopping the assessment process.

If you have questions or concerns in the mean time you may request a call-back, and one of our representatives will contact you within one business day.

textElements.name: Text
textElements.text:
Your quote is in the process of being assessed by an underwriter. When the assessment has been completed you will be notified by email.

You still have the option to edit your quote, which will allow you to make changes while also stopping the assessment process.

If you have questions or concerns in the mean time you may request a call-back, and one of our representatives will contact you within one business day.

textElements.name: Text
textElements.text:
Your quote has been endorsed by an underwriter and is ready for you to review, and proceed with if you choose.

You can also edit your quote details if you need to make changes, however please note that making changes to your quote could mean that the updated details will need to be assessed by an underwriter again before you can proceed.

If you have questions or concerns in the mean time you may request a call-back, and one of our representatives will contact you within one business day.

textElements.name: Text
textElements.text: Your quote has been assessed by an underwriter, however we require some more information from you before we can proceed.

textElements.name: Text
textElements.text:
The assessment of your quote has been completed. Unfortunately, based on your selections we are unable to proceed with your quote at this point.

You may edit your quote, and depending on the changes you make to your answers you may get a different result.

If you have questions or concerns in the mean time you may request a call-back, and one of our representatives will contact you within one business day.

textElements.name: Text
textElements.text: This quote has been referred to an underwriter for endorsement. You may review the answers that have triggered the referral, and either adjust the relevant loading factors and endorse the quote, return the quote to the customer with comments, or decline the quote.

textElements.name: Text
textElements.text: This quote had been endorsed and released to the customer, who can now complete the purchase of their policy.

textElements.name: Text
textElements.text: This quote has been returned to the customer with your comments. Another referral may be triggered before they can complete the purchase of their policy, depending on how they respond to your comments.

textElements.name: Text
textElements.text: This quote has been declined. The customer may choose to edit their quote, and this may result in another referral depending on which questions are answered differently.

purchaseQuote.startScreenExpression: getQuoteState() != 'expired' && (getUserType() == 'customer' || userHasPermission('manageQuotes')) && (getQuoteState() == 'incomplete' || getQuoteState() == 'nascent') && !(getCurrentWorkflowStep() == 'reviewReviewerReturned' || getCurrentWorkflowStep() == 'reviewCustomerReturned' || getCurrentWorkflowStep() == 'endorsementUnderwriterReturned' || getCurrentWorkflowStep() == 'endorsementCustomerReturned') && (getApplicationMode() == 'edit' || getApplicationMode() == 'create')

purchaseSummary.startScreenExpression: getQuoteState() != 'expired' && (getUserType() == 'customer' || userHasPermission('manageQuotes')) && getQuoteState() == 'approved' && getCurrentWorkflowStep() != 'reviewReviewerApproved' && getCurrentWorkflowStep() != 'reviewCustomerApproved' && getCurrentWorkflowStep() != 'endorsementUnderwriterApproved' && getCurrentWorkflowStep() != 'endorsementCustomerApproved' && getApplicationMode() == 'edit'

purchasePayment.tabIndexExpression: (getUserType() == 'customer' || userHasPermission('manageQuotes')) && (getQuoteState() == 'incomplete' || getQuoteState() == 'approved' || getQuoteState() == 'nascent') && (variableFinancialTransactionType == 'payment' || variableFinancialTransactionType == '' || variableFinancialTransactionType == null) ? 5 : null

purchaseDeclined.startScreenExpression: getQuoteState() != 'expired' && (getUserType() == 'customer' || userHasPermission('manageQuotes')) && getQuoteState() == 'declined' && (getCurrentWorkflowStep() != 'reviewCustomerDeclined' && getCurrentWorkflowStep() != 'reviewReviewerDeclined' && getCurrentWorkflowStep() != 'endorsementCustomerDeclined' && getCurrentWorkflowStep() != 'endorsementReviewerDeclined') && getApplicationMode() == 'edit'

reviewCustomerDeclined.startScreenExpression: getQuoteState() != 'expired' && (getUserType() == 'customer' || userHasPermission('manageQuotes')) && !userHasPermission('reviewQuotes') && getQuoteState() == 'declined' && (getCurrentWorkflowStep() == 'reviewReviewerDeclined' || getCurrentWorkflowStep() == 'reviewCustomerDeclined') && getApplicationMode() == 'edit' && getApplicationMode() == 'edit'

reviewReviewerApproved.startScreenExpression: getQuoteState() != 'expired' && getUserType() != 'customer' && !userHasPermission('manageQuotes') && userHasPermission('reviewQuotes') && getQuoteState() == 'approved' && (getCurrentWorkflowStep() == 'reviewReviewerApproved' || getCurrentWorkflowStep() == 'reviewCustomerApproved') && getApplicationMode() == 'edit'

reviewReviewerReturned.startScreenExpression: getQuoteState() != 'expired' && getUserType() != 'customer' && !userHasPermission('manageQuotes') && userHasPermission('reviewQuotes') && getQuoteState() == 'incomplete' && (getCurrentWorkflowStep() == 'reviewReviewerReturned' || getCurrentWorkflowStep() == 'reviewCustomerReturned') && getApplicationMode() == 'edit'

reviewReviewerDeclined.startScreenExpression: getQuoteState() != 'expired' && getUserType() != 'customer' && !userHasPermission('manageQuotes') && userHasPermission('reviewQuotes') && getQuoteState() == 'declined' && (getCurrentWorkflowStep() == 'reviewReviewerDeclined' || getCurrentWorkflowStep() == 'reviewCustomerDeclined') && getApplicationMode() == 'edit'

reviewReviewerReferred.startScreenExpression: getQuoteState() != 'expired' && getUserType() != 'customer' && !userHasPermission('manageQuotes') && userHasPermission('reviewQuotes') && !userHasPermission('endorseQuotes') && getQuoteState() == 'endorsement' && getCurrentWorkflowStep() != 'reviewReviewerReferred' && getApplicationMode() == 'edit'

endorsementUnderwriterApproved.startScreenExpression: getQuoteState() != 'expired' && getUserType() != 'customer' && !userHasPermission('manageQuotes') && userHasPermission('endorseQuotes') && getQuoteState() == 'approved' && (getCurrentWorkflowStep() == 'endorsementUnderwriterApproved' || getCurrentWorkflowStep() == 'endorsementCustomerApproved') && getApplicationMode() == 'edit'

endorsementUnderwriterReturned.startScreenExpression: getQuoteState() != 'expired' && getUserType() != 'customer' && !userHasPermission('manageQuotes') && userHasPermission('endorseQuotes') && getQuoteState() == 'incomplete' && (getCurrentWorkflowStep() == 'endorsementUnderwriterReturned' || getCurrentWorkflowStep() == 'endorsementCustomerReturned') && getApplicationMode() == 'edit'

endorsementUnderwriterDeclined.startScreenExpression: getQuoteState() != 'expired' && getUserType() != 'customer' && !userHasPermission('manageQuotes') && userHasPermission('endorseQuotes') && getQuoteState() == 'declined' && (getCurrentWorkflowStep() == 'endorsementUnderwriterDeclined' || getCurrentWorkflowStep() == 'endorsementCustomerDeclined') && getApplicationMode() == 'edit'
